citations.narrative:
The facility does not maintain records of distemper and parvovirus vaccines nor deworming treatments administered to
adult dogs. Facilities must record the names of all vaccines and treatments administered with dates of administration.
Failure to maintain dates of all vaccines and deworming treatments makes it difficult to ensure vaccines and treatments
are given in accordance to the written program of veterinary care. This must be addressed to to maintain adequate
veterinary care for dogs. Correct by 5/28/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
Jason Sifkarovski, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility does not maintain records of distemper and parvovirus vaccines nor deworming treatments administered to 
adult dogs. Facilities must record the names of all vaccines and treatments administered with dates of administration. 
Failure to maintain dates of all vaccines and deworming treatments makes it difficult to ensure vaccines and treatments 
are given in accordance to the written program of veterinary care. This must be addressed to to maintain adequate 
veterinary care for dogs. Correct by 5/28/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jason Sifkarovski, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
